doctors.name: Dr.Ch.Nagaraj
bio: Dr. Ch Nagaraj is a highly skilled Anaesthesiologist with specialized expertise in cardiac, neuro, and vascular anaesthesia. He is proficient in managing complex perioperative scenarios, with a strong focus on kidney transplant anaesthesia and intensive care medicine. Dr. Nagaraj’s practice encompasses the comprehensive management of high-risk surgical patients, ensuring safe anaesthesia delivery and seamless post-operative care. His core interests lie in perioperative medicine and critical care, where he contributes to improving patient outcomes through precise monitoring, pain management, and life support interventions. Dedicated and meticulous, Dr. Nagaraj upholds the highest standards of clinical excellence and patient safety in every procedure he undertakes.

doctors.name: V.A VANI
awards: Presented many papers & posters at various conferences

doctors.name: Dr.N.Surya
bio: Dr. N. Surya is an experienced Intensivist specializing in the management of critically ill patients across a wide spectrum of medical emergencies. His clinical expertise includes the intensive care of patients with severe respiratory, cardiac, neurological, and renal conditions. Dr. Surya is also proficient in managing complex trauma cases and is well-versed in advanced life-support therapies, including ECMO (Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation). With a commitment to evidence-based medicine and multidisciplinary collaboration, he provides timely, precise, and compassionate care in high-acuity situations. Dr. Surya’s approach is centered on stabilizing critical conditions and guiding patients safely through the most challenging phases of illness.
area_expertise: MANAGEMENT OF RESPIRATORY, CARDIAC, NEURO AND RENAL
MANAGEMENT OF RESPIRATORY, CARDIAC, NEURO AND RENAL

doctors.name: Dr.Sudharshana reddy.g
bio: Dr. Sudharshana Reddy G is a skilled and dedicated Cardiologist with expertise in a wide range of interventional cardiac procedures. His clinical focus includes coronary and carotid peripheral interventions, pacemaker implantation, implantable cardioverter defibrillators (ICDs), and valvular interventions. With a strong commitment to patient-centered care, Dr. Sudharshana Reddy combines advanced procedural skills with evidence-based practices to manage both acute and chronic cardiovascular conditions. His thorough diagnostic approach and precision in interventional therapy make him a trusted specialist for complex cardiac care.
awards: Presented many papers & posters at various national & international conferences

doctors.name: Dr.Vijaya Bhaskar Mallela
area_expertise: He has performed numerous laser surgeries.

doctors.name: Dr.Kolloju Srikanth
bio: Dr. Kolloju Srikanth is a skilled and experienced ENT specialist with comprehensive expertise in both medical and surgical management of ear, nose, and throat disorders. He is proficient in advanced procedures such as tonsil and adenoid surgeries, microscopic laryngeal surgery, grommet insertion, and Functional Endoscopic Sinus Surgery (FESS). Dr. Srikanth has a special focus on congenital ear conditions, hearing loss, tinnitus, and vertigo. His surgical skills also extend to thyroid surgery, septorhinoplasty, and endoscopic orbital and optic nerve decompression. Known for his patient-centered care, he also provides effective management for allergies and offers reconstructive middle ear surgery and hearing aid solutions.
area_expertise: ENDOSCOPIC DCR, ORBITAL & OPTIC NERVE DECOMPRESSION

doctors.name: Dr .Katikareddy V .Venugopal Reddy
bio: Dr. Katikareddy V. Venugopal Reddy is a highly experienced Gastroenterologist specializing in the diagnosis and management of a wide range of gastrointestinal, liver, and pancreatic disorders. His clinical expertise includes treating acid peptic disease, jaundice, peptic ulcers, and both acute and chronic conditions of the liver, bile ducts, and pancreas. He is well-versed in managing Inflammatory Bowel Diseases (IBD) such as Ulcerative Colitis and Crohn's Disease, and performs advanced procedures including endoscopy, colonoscopy, ERCP, biliary stenting, and banding (EVL). Dr. Reddy is known for delivering patient-centered care with precision and compassion.
area_expertise: Acid peptic disease: Jaundice, Gas trouble, Management of acute and chronic – diseases like Liver, Pancreatic, Bile Duct diseases
Simple and Complex IBD (Ulcerative Colitis and Crohn's Disease)

doctors.name: Dr.Jayasimha.N
bio: Dr Jayasimha Nagella is a laparoscopic surgeon, bariatric surgeon and general surgeon at Omni Hospital in Kothapet, Hyderabad, with eight years of experience. He completed an MBBS from Kurnool Medical College, Kurnool in 2004. He later obtained a DNB in General Surgery from the National Board of Examinations, New Delhi in 2011 and a Fellowship in Minimal Access Surgery from ASICON in 2012.
Some of the services provided by Dr Nagella are: All laparoscopic surgeries, stapled laser surgery for hemorrhoids, laser surgery for varicose veins, bariatric surgeries, etc.
education: MBBS (Kurnool Medical College – 2004)
DNB (General Surgery New Delhi – 2011)
fellowships: Fellowship in Minimal Access Surgery from ASICON in 2012
Fellowship in the Indian Association of Gastrointestinal Endo Surgeons in 2014

doctors.name: Dr.B.Jaipal Reddy.
bio: Dr B. Jaipal Reddy is a General Physician and Diabetologist in Kothapet, Hyderabad and has 19 years of experience in this field. Dr. Jaipal Reddy. He obtained an MBBS from Kakatiya Medical College, Warangal and in 2012, an MD in General Medicine from MNR Medical College, Sangareddy. In 2014, he received a PGDDM from Middle Sex University, UK WHO Certified, in Diabetology.
area_expertise: Management Of Pre – Diabetic Cases, Diabetic Complications

doctors.name: Dr.Gopireddy Pavan Kumar Reddy
bio: Dr. Gopireddy Pavan Kumar Reddy is a skilled General Physician with expertise in the comprehensive management of pre-diabetic conditions, diabetes-related complications, and thyroid disorders. He is also experienced in treating hypertension, dyslipidemia (high cholesterol), and infectious diseases, including sepsis. Dr. Reddy’s clinical approach focuses on early diagnosis, preventive care, and effective management of chronic illnesses. His proficiency also extends to managing vertigo and related systemic conditions, ensuring patients receive holistic and evidence-based care.
area_expertise: MANAGEMENT OF PRE – DIABETIC CASES ; DIABETIC COMPLICATIONS

doctors.name: Dr.Radlam Padma Kumari
bio: Dr. Radlam Padma Kumari is a skilled Obstetrician and Gynecologist with expertise in managing high-risk pregnancies, including pregnancy-induced hypertension, eclampsia, and pre-eclampsia. She is proficient in performing both elective and emergency LSCS (Cesarean sections) and offers advanced fertility care including In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF). Dr. Padma Kumari also has considerable experience in gynecological surgeries, ensuring comprehensive women’s health care through all stages of life.

doctors.name: Dr.Ch.Ranjith Kumar
awards: Presented many papers & posters at various conferences

doctors.name: Dr.Bopparaju Srinivas Rao
bio: Dr. Bopparaju Srinivas Rao is an experienced Nephrologist specializing in the diagnosis and management of Acute Kidney Injury, Chronic Kidney Disease, and Hypertension. He has significant expertise in Clinical Nephrology, Kidney Stone management, and Renal Transplantation. Dr. Srinivas Rao is committed to providing comprehensive renal care with a focus on early intervention, patient education, and long-term kidney health.

doctors.name: Dr.A.Masthan Reddy
bio: Dr. Mastan Reddy is a Neurosurgeon in Kothapet, Hyderabad, and has an experience of 17 years in this field. Dr. Mastan Reddy practices at Omni Hospitals in Kothapet, Hyderabad, Hyderabad. He completed MBBS, MS Gen. Surgery from Guntur Medical College, Guntur in 1995 and M.ch Neuro Surgery from Osmania Medical College in 2001. Some of the services provided by the doctor are: Aneurysm Surgery, Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Treatment, Epilepsy surgery, Deep Brain Stimulation, Gamma-Knife Radiosurgery, Base of the skull tumour like meningioma and other brain tumours, Spinal surgeries like disc surgery, CV Junction anamolies surgeries, Spinal fixation procedure, Spinal Cord tumour etc
education: MBBS – Guntur Medical College, Guntur, 1991
MS – Gen. Surgery – Guntur Medical College, Guntur, 1995

doctors.name: Dr.Umesh Prasad Sharma
bio: Dr. Umesh Prasad Sharma, a renowned Neuro Physician in Hyderabad, has 19 years of experience in neurology. Practicing at Omni Hospitals in Kothapet, Hyderabad, Dr. Sharma completed his MBBS from Patna Medical College, MD in General Medicine from Maulana Azad Medical College, and DM in Neurology from G. B. Pant Hospital, Delhi. As a trusted Neuro Physician in Hyderabad, he is a member of the Neurological Society of India and the Indian Academy of Neurology. His expertise includes stroke management, headache treatment, epilepsy care, and spinal disorder management.
education: MBBS – Patna Medical College, Patna, 1990
MD (Medicine) 1994, MAMC, Delhi

Dr Raghudeep Palla is a consultant pulmonologist at Omni Hospitals, Kothapet. He specialises in pulmonology, critical care and sleep medicine. He graduated from Osmania Medical College in 2010 and from Kamineni Institute of Medical Sciences in 2015. In 2016, he trained in Critical Care Medicine (ISCCM). Some of the services provided by the Dr Raghudeep are: bronchial asthma treatment, chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases, airway allergic diseases, tuberculosis treatment, interstitial lung diseases, bronchoscopy, ventilator management treatment of sleep apnea disorder, medical thoracoscopy, etc.

doctors.name: Dr. Padmaja Subrahmanyam
bio: Dr. Ch. Saidulu is an accomplished Medical Gastroenterologist with over 6 years of clinical experience. He specializes in advanced diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, including Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) with FNAC, Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography (ERCP), EVL banding, and Endoscopic Mucosal Resection (EMR). Dr. Saidulu has extensive expertise in managing gastrointestinal conditions such as acid reflux, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), liver diseases, and pancreatic disorders. He is also proficient in managing GI cancers and liver cirrhosis, offering comprehensive care for complex gastrointestinal conditions with a patient-centered approach.

bio: Dr. Payal Chitranshi is an ENT/ Otorhinolaryngologist in Kukatpally, Hyderabad and has an experience of 11 years in this field. Dr. Payal Chitranshi practices at OMNI Hospitals in Kukatpally, Hyderabad. She completed MBBS from LTMMC Sion Mumbai in 2000 and MS – ENT from LTMMC Sion Mumbai in 2006.
Some of the services provided by the doctor are: Head and Neck Tumor / Cancer Surgery, Surgery for Snoring, Thyroid Disorder Treatment, Microsurgery of the Larynx and Ear Micro Surgery etc.
Listen to Dr. Payal Chitransi, ENT Doctor at Omni Hospitals Kukatpally, talk about various ENT issues, their causes and other lesser known facts about the issues regarding ENT.

doctors.name: Dr. Chirra Raveendra Reddy
bio: Dr Ravinder Reddy is a Consultant Urologist based in Hyderabad. He holds his expertise in treatment and management of all Urological diseases like; Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH), Bladder Cancer, Female Urology, Incontinence, Kidney Cancer, Paediatric Urology, Peyronies disease, Prostate Cancer, Recurring Urinary Tract Infection, Renal Transplantation, Sexual Dysfunction, Stone Disease, and Testicular Cancer. He is an experienced doctor and with his knowledge and skills he has treated a number of patients with satisfactory results. Attending workshops and seminars is something which helps him walk hand-in-hand with the new technological advancements in the field of Urology.

doctors.name: Dr S.Kiran
bio: Dr. S. Kiran is a skilled Dermatologist with extensive experience in clinical and aesthetic dermatology. He provides specialized care for a range of skin and hair conditions including eczema, acne, psoriasis, vitiligo, and skin allergies. Dr. Kiran is proficient in advanced treatments such as acne scar revision, laser therapy, and effective management of hair loss. He also offers diagnosis and treatment for sexually transmitted skin diseases, ensuring a discreet and comprehensive approach. With a strong focus on personalized care, Dr. Kiran blends clinical expertise with cosmetic precision to help patients achieve healthy, confident skin.
awards: VAIDYA RATNA AWARD - DERMATOLOGY 2016

doctors.name: Dr Nagavender Rao M
bio: Dr. Nagavender Rao M is an experienced General Physician with clinical expertise in managing a wide spectrum of acute and chronic medical conditions. His core areas of interest include infectious diseases, pyrexia of unknown origin (PUO), and communicable illnesses. Dr. Nagavender is well-versed in the long-term management of hypertension, diabetes, and thyroid disorders, providing evidence-based care tailored to each patient. He is also trained in handling acute poisoning cases and delivering effective critical care support in complex scenarios. With a thorough and compassionate approach, Dr. Nagavender is committed to accurate diagnosis and holistic treatment for patients across all age groups.

He has expertise in stroke management(thrombolytic therapy), epilepsy, vertigo, and migraine /headaches management. His other areas of expertise are Parkinson’s disease, Alzheimer’s disease, neuromuscular disorders, Botox injections for dystonia & spasticity, electrophysiology(ENMG), multiple sclerosis, and sleep medicine.

doctors.name: Dr. Rajendar Byshetty
bio: Dr. Rajendar Byshetty is a skilled Surgical Oncologist with 5 years of experience. He completed his MS at JIPMER, followed by a DNB from NBE, a Fellowship in Minimal Access Surgery (FMAS) from AMASI, and an MCh from AIIMS, Jodhpur. Dr. Byshetty excels in advanced cancer surgeries, including oncoplastic breast cancer surgery, cytoreductive surgeries with HIPEC, and minimally invasive procedures for various cancers. His expertise also covers complex multiorgan resections and reconstructive surgeries for oral cancer. Dr. Byshetty is dedicated to providing comprehensive and innovative cancer care to his patients.

bio: Dr. Sandeep Pemira is a highly experienced Nephrologist renowned for his expertise in kidney care. As an experienced doctor in the field of nephrology, Dr. Pemira has dedicated himself to providing exceptional patient care and advancing the understanding and treatment of kidney-related conditions. His commitment to excellence and patient well-being is evident in his approach to diagnosis, treatment, and ongoing management of kidney diseases.

doctors.name: Dr. Praneeth Reddy
bio: Dr. Praneeth Reddy stands as an eminent orthopedic surgeon applauded for his expertise in trauma (including fracture management), sports medicine, Hip, knee, and joint replacement surgeries (both primary and revision), hip regrow therapy, etc. With a wealth of experience, he leads in diagnosing, treating fractures, and ensuring optimal recovery. His proficiency extends to sports-related injuries and advanced joint replacement procedures.
education: MBBS-SRI VENKATESHWARA MEDICAL COLLEGE, TIRUPATHI, NTRUHS(2004-10)
MS (ORTHO) - ALLURI SITARAMARAJU ACADEMY OF MEDICAL SCIENCES, NTRUHS (2011-14)
fellowships: FELLOWSHIP IN SHOULDER AND ELBOW SURGERY-CTO-GAETANO PINI, MILAN, ITALY.

doctors.name: Dr. Neelima M
bio: Dr. Neelima Mamidipally is a Board-Certified Plastic & Reconstructive Surgeon with over 13 years of experience in Hyderabad. She completed her MBBS from Prathima Medical College, her MS in General Surgery from SVS Medical College, Mahabubnagar, and her MCh in Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery from Gandhi Medical College & Hospital. She also served as a Former Assistant Professor in the Department of General Surgery at Vydehi Institute of Medical Sciences, Bangalore.  Dr. Neelima specializes in facial trauma, hand trauma, burns management, and cosmetic surgeries including breast augmentation, abdominoplasty, and facial aesthetics procedures (Botox, fillers). She is a proud member of the Indian Association of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (IAAPS), The Association of Plastic Surgeons of India (APSI), and APRAS (Association of Plastic, Reconstructive, and Aesthetic Surgeons of AP & Telangana). Her meticulous approach ensures minimal scarring and quick recovery, making her a trusted choice for patients seeking safe, natural-looking results with empathetic care.
education: MBBS - Prathima Institute Of Medical Sciences - Karimnagar
MS - General Surgery - SV S Medical College - Mahabubnagar
MCh - Plastic Surgery - Gandhi Medical College - Secunderabad
area_expertise: Breast surgeries (breast augmentation,  Breast lift, Breast reduction)
Abdominoplasty (Tummy Tuck), liposuction, and Hair transplantation.

doctors.name: Dr. Saidulu
bio: Dr. Ch. Saidulu is an accomplished Medical Gastroenterologist with over 6 years of clinical experience. He specializes in advanced diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, including Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) with FNAC, Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography (ERCP), EVL banding, and Endoscopic Mucosal Resection (EMR). Dr. Saidulu has extensive expertise in managing gastrointestinal conditions such as acid reflux, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), liver diseases, and pancreatic disorders. He is also proficient in managing GI cancers and liver cirrhosis, offering comprehensive care for complex gastrointestinal conditions with a patient-centered approach.
education: MBBS - Kakatiya Medical College, Telangana
MD - General Medicine - SVS Medical College, Telangana
DrNB - Medical Gastroenterology - Nizam’s Institute of Medical Sciences, Hyderabad, Telangana
area_expertise: Liver Diseases & Disorders (Hepatitis, Fatty Liver, Cirrhosis, Liver Cancer)
Management of acute and chronic pancreatitis & complications

doctors.name: Dr. Ranjith Nellore Mahesh
bio: Dr. Ranjith Nellore Mahesh is a highly skilled orthopedic surgeon with extensive experience in treating complex pediatric orthopedic conditions and performing hip and knee replacement surgeries. His expertise includes managing cases of Developmental Dysplasia of the Hip (DDH), Cerebral Palsy, Slipped Capital Femoral Epiphysis (SCFE), Septic Arthritis, Osteomyelitis, Coxa Vara, Blount’s Disease, Congenital Talipes Equinovarus (CTEV), Congenital Vertical Talus (CVT), and various deformity corrections.
awards: APJ abdul kalam Award - 2025
education: MBBS, MS - Orthopaedics,
FIPO ( paediatric orthopedics in the prestigious Indira Gandhi Institute of Child Health Bangalore )
Member of Telangana Orthopaedic Surgeons Association (TOSA)
area_expertise: Replacements – Knee and hip replacements and revisions
Deformity corrections of upper and Lower Limbs

doctors.name: Dr. Naga Sudha Ashok
bio: Dr. R. Naga Sudha Ashok is a highly experienced Surgical Gastroenterologist with over 10 years of expertise in the field. He completed his MBBS and MS in General Surgery from Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences, Andhra Pradesh, and further pursued a DNB in Surgical Gastroenterology. Dr. Ashok specializes in advanced laparoscopic surgery and has vast experience in surgeries of the pancreas, liver, and gallbladder. He is skilled in laparoscopic hernia surgeries, laser surgery for anal fissures, piles, and fistulas, as well as bariatric and metabolic surgery for weight loss. Additionally, his expertise extends to treating gastrointestinal cancers, including those of the esophagus, gallbladder, liver, pancreas, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, and rectum. Dr. Ashok is also adept in colorectal surgeries, GI trauma, rescue surgery, and liver transplantation, providing comprehensive care for patients with complex gastrointestinal conditions.
education: MBBS - Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences Andhra Pradesh, 2013
MS - General Surgery - Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences Andhra Pradesh, 2017

doctors.name: Dr. Ragi Prasad
bio: Dr Ragi Prasad is the best orthopaedician in Hyderabad. He is the Chief Orthopaedics And Joint Replacement Surgeon With More Than A Decade Experience And Worked At Prestigious Institutions Like NIMS In Hyderabad And University Klinikum, Mannheim, Germany. Has Special Interest In Treating Knee Related Problems. Performed And Participated In 5000 Orthopedic Surgeries And Treated More Than 25,000 Out-Patients. He is a well-known and the best knee replacement surgeon.
awards: Best Orthopedic Surgeon - 2008
Best Treatment In the Critical Bone Surgery - 2013
education: MBBS - JJM MEDICAL COLLEGE
University - Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore.
M.S - Bapuji Hospital and Chigateri General Hospital
University - Rajiv Gandhi university of health sciences
fellowships: FELLOW IN KNEE JOINT REPLACEMENTS -2005- From Dr. Gurava Reddy, KIMS, Hyderabad.
FELLOW IN SPORTS TRAUMA. 2006 to 2007 - Nizams Institute of Medical
FELLOW IN HIP AND KNEE ARTHROPLASTY - 2007 - University of Heidelberg, Germany.Sciences, Hyderabad.

expertise: Chronic Total Occlusion Stenting After Primary Angioplasty

doctors.doctor_designation: Director and Chief of Spine Surgery
